comments.body: I have read the topic. First of all congrats for your betslip that has won. You are complaining about Sportsbet.io's decision but you could have understood the reason if you read the rules. If the mentioned tennis player didn't withdraw from the game he had a possibility of winning the set by 5-7. If this possibility got real then your +4.5 handicapped bet was going to lose and the bet wouldn't be concluded terminatively. Because of this, your +4.5 handicapped bet wasn't valid and -4.5 handicapped bets have also been cancelled at the same time.If the -4.5 handicapped bets are cancelled and the +4.5 handicapped bets are paid then this would make the website be in loss.
